name: Golf in Precarious Places
description:
^ Web build is a little scuffed with the camera. Probably want to download it. Also, sometimes the ball gets stuck, so I'm not liable if your eardrums get ruptured. You've been warned!

A half-broken minigolf game made with Bevy and Rust in 2* weeks (actually 5 days because we kept changing ideas).

This game has the potential to cause you a lot of pain, but there isn't any working progression yet, so it's just one level! :D

Brooke Rhodes - Student ID: 2124791 - Programming

Rosie Barfield - Student ID: 2069857 - Art

Jack Ayling - Student ID: 2121510 - Game Design
